reviewText: This is an excellent family movie about love and survival. I would recomend it for any family or group such a church youth groups or school classes.
summary: A wonderful movie for all ages
Title: Escape from Wildcat Canyon

reviewText: This movie is terrific.  Surprisingly, any age can watch it and enjoy it. There were a few shortcuts in the movie and the mother grins like the village fool throughout the movie, but it's a great story with good adventure and wonderful acting by the kid and his grandfather.The story moves along at a pretty good clip. Adults and children will enjoy this romp  through nature, though some of it is a tad contrived, it still came out as solid good entertainment.Review by Dear Miss Mermaid, author of "Hurricanes and Hangovers"
summary: Great Movie!  Good for all ages too
Title: Escape from Wildcat Canyon

reviewText: I enjoyed this family adventure movie. The scenery was really nice, and the plot and acting were ok as well.  Not a blockbuster but an enjoyable family movie.
Title: Escape from Wildcat Canyon

reviewText: good movie, great actors, good story, of how they survied a plane crash in the canyon and go to find help.
Title: Escape from Wildcat Canyon

reviewText: Wasn't really expecting to much from this film but turned out to be a great watch and perfect for the kids. there is absolutely no foul language in it. And I mean none because I watch that closely. If all you want is great clean entertainment with the family then get this film. If you want sex crazed, violent, crude and demoralizing then pass.
Title: Escape from Wildcat Canyon

reviewText: A beautiful film. I strongly recommend this one it got me abseiling again for the fun of it. Great film, moving adventure for all ages.
Title: Escape from Wildcat Canyon
